comments.body:
Is this necessary? `LogMessageFatal::~LogMessageFatal()` has `TF_ATTRIBUTE_NORETURN`, so the lack of a return statement shouldn't (AIUI) give an error. Or is this compiler-version-specific?

(Same goes for the other similar changes in here.)
it is only needed because msvc fails debug builds that the function has no return value

It works in Release/RelWithDebInfo builds though, right?

I'd prefer to keep these as-is for now, as I think there are other issues that prevent a Debug build from succeeding (something about taking the address of zero-length iterators, if my memory serves me). Can you split these changes out and we'll consider them separately?
